name: Picanha
alternateName: Prime Part of the Top Sirloin
description: Our signature steak, picanha represents the art and science of churrasco cooking. Lightly seasoned with rock salt and sliced thin, it is tender with a robust flavor. There would be no churrasco without picanha.

name: Filet Mignon
description: You have never tasted filet prepared like this before. Our gaucho chefs expertly grill the tenderloin on skewers and skillfully carve the perfect bite every time.

name: Beef Ancho
description: Arguably one of the most popular cuts in the world, the ancho requires a unique cooking technique to bring out its intense profile. We grill over direct heat to break down the marbling and deliver an unforgettable texture and distinct flavor.

name: Alcatra
description: Alcatra is a special cut of top sirloin originating in the steakhouses of Southern Brazil. One of the largest cuts served in our dining rooms, you shouldn’t miss a sample of this perfectly seasoned, thinly carved cut.

name: Fraldinha
description: Fraldinha is one of the most distinctive and flavorful cuts of meat from Southern Brazil due to its strong marbling characteristics. Our gaucho chefs carve against the grain to ensure the cut remains as tender and flavorful as possible.

name: Costela
description: These succulent ribs are first rubbed slightly with rock salt, which creates a seasoned crust. The costela is then grilled for several hours to bring forward its natural flavors.

name: Medalhões Com Bacon
description: Steak is lightly seasoned with rock salt and then wrapped in our hardwood-smoked, honey-cured bacon.

name: New York Strip
description: Seasoned with rock salt and fire-roasted to tender.

name: Wagyu New York Strip
description: Premium graded Kerwee Wagyu, aged for 21 days.

name: Cordeiro
description: For lamb lovers or those curious to taste it for the first time, our gaucho chefs serve the cordeiro as Prime Lamb Steak, succulent lamb chops or a tender leg of lamb.

name: Costela De Porco
description: The ribs are marinated in a signature combination of white wine and special seasoning, and then slow-roasted to perfection.

name: Frango
description: Our chicken leg recipe includes a custom beer and brandy marinade, which makes it one of our most talked-about meats. Our gaucho chefs also wrap tender chicken breasts in savory bacon.

name: Lombo
description: Pork medallions are coated with Parmesan cheese, and then grilled to seal in the juiciness of this lean meat.

name: Linguiça
description: Spicy pork sausage with savory garlic, onion with red chili.

name: Pork Picanha
description: Lightly seasoned, tender, fire-roasted and carved tableside.
